ASEAN Director Addresses South China–Indonesia Summit in Shenzhen

On January 17, Marco Förster, ASEAN Director at Dezan Shira & Associates, participated remotely in the “Expert’s Briefing on Indonesia and Southern China Future Trajectory,” an event hosted by the Consulate General of Indonesia in Guangzhou.
